hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CONNECTION_LABEL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The connection your super admin user will use to authenticate.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: export USER_ID=`uuidgen -r` export USER_ID_HEX=`echo $USER_ID | awk '{ print toupper($0) }'|sed 's/-//g'` docker run -i --security-opt label=disable -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=picsure mariadb:10.7 mysql -e \ "INSERT INTO auth.user VALUES (unhex('$USER_ID_HEX'), null, '{\"email\":\"$EMAIL\"}', null, (select uuid from connection where label='$CONNECTION_LABEL'),'$EMAIL',0,null,1,null);" auth docker run -i --security-opt label=disable -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=picsure mariadb:10.7 mysql -e \ "INSERT INTO auth.user_role VALUES (unhex('$USER_ID_HEX'), unhex('002DC366B0D8420F998F885D0ED797FD'));" auth docker run -i --security-opt label=disable -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=picsure mariadb:10.7 mysql -e \ "INSERT INTO auth.user_role VALUES (unhex('$USER_ID_HEX'), unhex('797FD002DC366B0D8420F998F885D0ED'));" auth
